attributes.action: allow Arnel Cabrera and his son Zac to stay in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Arnel Cabrera, a Filipino national, is being deported after his wife was killed in the hospital in which she worked, shortly after giving birth to their son, Zac. We believe this is completely unnecessary, given the circumstances of his wife's death. We petition the Prime Minister to give Mr. Cabrera a work visa that will be valid for one year. If during this time he finds a permanent job, he should be allowed a permanent work visa that would replace the one that became void upon his wife's death.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
